name: Name

oncePartnerDeleted: Once deleted, this partner can not be assigned to actions and will lose its user credentials.

selectLogoutToEnd: Select 'Logout' if you're ready to end your current session.
notEnoughInfoForBalance: You don't have enough info loaded for balance yet. Please add actions to the selected period or select another one.
backendServicesError: There is an error in our backend services. Please try again later.
onceActionDeleted: Once deleted, this action won't able anymore.
oncePeriodDeleted: Once deleted, this period won't able anymore.
actionVisibilityHelp: Choose whether you want the action to be visible to other cooperatives, as well as in other sections of COOBS.
principleVisibilityHelp: Choose if you want the principle to be visible in the panel, as well as considered for statistics and balance.
budgetHelp: The budget to be used in this period is 5% of the profits obtained.
notEnoughInfoForDashboard: There's no enough info loaded for dashboard yet. Please add some actions to your cooperative or select another period.
notEnoughInfoForActionsRanking: There's no enough info loaded to show in the actions ranking yet. Please add some actions to your cooperative to see how good you are doing.
noActionsResults: There are not actions for the filters selected.
emptyActionMsgForCurrentPeriod: No action has yet been created for the selected period!
emptyActionMsg: No action has yet been created!
dashboardHelp: Here you will be able to see graphs and indicators of your cooperative based on the actions carried out in the selected period.
actionsRankingHelp: Check with other cooperatives how they go with their actions and ask them to help you improving yours!
myStatsHelp: Here you will be able to see graphs and indicators based on the actions carried out by you in the selected period.
allPrinciplesTooltip: Since actions can be associated with several principles, the total of actions group by principles can differ from total done actions.
hoursToInvestHelp: This field will set a goal to fulfill for the current period.
noPovertyDesc: End poverty in all its forms everywhere
goodHealthDesc: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
genderEqualityDesc: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
cleanWaterDesc: Ensure access to water and sanitation for all
cleanEnergyDesc: Ensure access to affordable, reliable, sustainable and modern energy
decentWorkDesc: Promote inclusive and sustainable economic growth, employment and decent work for all
industryInnovationDesc: Build resilient infrastructure, promote sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
reducedInequalitiesDesc: Reduce inequality within and among countries
sustainableCitiesDesc: Make cities inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
responsibleConsumptionDesc: Ensure sustainable consumption and production patterns
climateActionDesc: Take urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts
lifeBelowWaterDesc: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources
lifeOnLandDesc: Sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, halt and reverse land degradation, halt biodiversity loss
peaceJusticeDesc: Promote just, peaceful and inclusive societies
partnershipsDesc: Revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development
selectPrincipleOrODS: Must select a principle or a sustainable development goal
sdgBalanceSubtitle: Social Balance for period {period} from {from} to {to} and a budget of ${budget}.
noSDGObjectivesMessage: You don't have any objectives yet!
onceSDGObjectiveDeleted: Once deleted, this objective won't able anymore.
notEnoughInfoForMonitoring: There's no enough info loaded to monitor yet. Please add some actions to your cooperative or select another period.
monitoringHelp: Here you will be able to monitor the goals you previously set for the Sustainable development goals. The progress you see is based on the actions carried out by your cooperative in the selected period.
sustainableDevelopmentGoalsActiveHelp: Use sustainable development goals in COOBS?
zeroPartnerHoursGoal: You haven't configured your hours to invest goal.
noActionsRelatedToMonitor: There are no actions related to this objective. Please add any related actions in order to monitor your goals.
forgottenPassTitle: Did you forget your login password?
forgottenPassDescription: Complete your email and we will send you a link to reset your password.
emailSentText-2: We've sent you a message so you can choose a new password. Remember to check your Spam folder.
passwordChanged-2: Your password has been changed successfully
descriptionICAHelp: This description has being voted by an ACI assembly
descriptionPrincipleHelp: You can customize this description based on your cooperative culture
openAndVoluntaryDesc: Cooperatives are voluntary organisations, open to all persons able to use their services and willing to accept the responsibilities of membership, without gender, social, racial, political or religious discrimination.
democraticControlDesc: Cooperatives are democratic organisations controlled by their members, who actively participate in setting their policies and making decisions. Men and women serving as elected representatives are accountable to the membership. In primary cooperatives members have equal voting rights (one member, one vote) and cooperatives at other levels are also organised in a democratic manner.
economicParticipationDesc: Members contribute equitably to, and democratically control, the capital of their cooperative. At least part of that capital is usually the common property of the cooperative. Members usually receive limited compensation, if any, on capital subscribed as a condition of membership. Members allocate surpluses for any or all of the following purposes: developing their cooperative, possibly by setting up reserves, part of which at least would be indivisible; benefiting members in proportion to their transactions with the cooperative; and supporting other activities approved by the membership.
autonomyIndependenceDesc: Cooperatives are autonomous, self-help organisations controlled by their members. If they enter into agreements with other organisations, including governments, or raise capital from external sources, they do so on terms that ensure democratic control by their members and maintain their cooperative autonomy.
educationTrainingDesc: Cooperatives provide education and training for their members, elected representatives, managers, and employees so they can contribute effectively to the development of their co-operatives. They inform the general public - particularly young people and opinion leaders - about the nature and benefits of co-operation.
cooperationBetweenCoopsDesc: Cooperatives serve their members most effectively and strengthen the cooperative movement by working together through local, national, regional and international structures.
commitmentToCommunityDesc: Cooperatives work for the sustainable development of their communities through policies approved by their members.
